title: Anyone Else Having Issues with the Client?
body: I keep trying to launch the client and it keeps saying to re-install (which I've already done the first time I saw the message).

replies.body:
The game files went a bit wonky when you went to try and reinstall, but thankfully I have some steps you can see right here: 


http://imgur.com/a/ShXRK


That should get you back in the game with no issues. If you do though, let me know :)

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qwkP9BWJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-10T21:23:36.514+0000)
>
> The game files went a bit wonky when you went to try and reinstall, but thankfully I have some steps you can see right here: 
> 
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/ShXRK
> 
> 
> That should get you back in the game with no issues. If you do though, let me know :)

I just went in and completely deleted all files associated with League. That ended up doing it after I reinstalled it again. Thank you!
